resources.string: Government medical services provided to your doorstep

string-array.name: onboarding_contents
string-array.item: We Provide medical services at your door stop, at any time of the day
Request will be directed to the nearest hospital in Sahanthana network
A team of medical professionals will be dispatched immediately to your desired location

resources.string: Medical help and services at your door step
A hospital in our network respond to the request made by the patients
After taking necessary details over a phone call they will dispatch a team for medical help/ services which you have requested in the shortest possible time
Are you sure you want to send this request?
We will get back to you shortly

string-array.name: request_type_info_array
string-array.item: Any acute illness which you feel that need immediate attention
Any emergency arising from injury to bone, joins, muscles etc
Illness associated to infant, child and adolescents
Rehabilitation after trauma, joint diseases, post surgical care, or any other chronic conditions
Nursing assistance for bedridden patients or attending any other patient who need medical attention at home
Nursing assistance to pregnant ladies before delivery and child and mother after the delivery

resources.string: Are you sure you want to send this request?
By signing up, you agree to our terms and privacy policy

string-array.name: treatment_type_info_array
string-array.item: Any illness which you feel, that can be treated at home
Any minor injuries to bone, joins, muscles etc which can be treated at home
Illness associated to infant, child and adolescents
Rehabilitation after trauma, joint diseases, post surgical care, or any other chronic conditions
Nursing assistance for bedridden patients or attending any other patient who need medical attention at home
Nursing assistance to pregnant ladies before delivery and child and mother after the delivery on daily visit basis

Sample for your laboratory test will be collected from your home by technician from nearest lab in our network to your location.You have to send a request at least 12hrs prior to your required sample collection time
